sentences.en: Body lithe. Deep brisket almost down to point of elbow.
sentences.cn: 柔韧, 胸深差不多达到肘部.

sentences.en: Deer characteristically have [ b ] lithe but compact bodies and short tails.
sentences.cn: 鹿通常是身体短小而柔软,有短短的尾巴.

sentences.en: For the figure, the professor recommends something lithe and supple.
sentences.cn: 身材嘛, 专家觉得娇小玲珑比较好.

sentences.en: Gibbon adapted to the forest with its long lithe arms.
sentences.cn: 长臂猿以其柔长的手臂来适应丛林的生活.

sentences.en: He stretched his lean, lithe body.
sentences.cn: 他伸了伸他那瘦削, 灵活的肢体.

sentences.en: He was lithe; that was the word she had thought of while watching him.
sentences.cn: 他很轻捷, 当时她望着他时想到的是这个词.

sentences.en: His lithe athlete's body had been his pride through most of the fifty - six years.
sentences.cn: 他那轻巧自如的运动员体格,五十六年来几乎一直使他感到自豪.

sentences.en: His walk was lithe and graceful.
Lithe ribbon - dancers with zither - strumming and pipa - plucking ladies as backup? Done that.
sentences.cn: 中国的杂技演员顶着瓷碗向后弯腰及地.

sentences.en: Sea lions are [ b ] lithe animals with the small ears.
sentences.cn: 海狮 是身体柔软还有小小的耳朵的动物.

sentences.en: She has the lithe grace of a gymnast.
sentences.cn: 她有体操运动员轻盈而优美的体态.

sentences.en: The cat goes furtively downstairs, winding her lithe tail and licking her lips.
sentences.cn: 那只猫蜷着它那弯弯的尾巴,用舌头舔着嘴角,贼头贼脑地溜下楼去.

sentences.en: The picture shows Chinese workers at Lithe Shipbuilding Factory.
sentences.cn: 图为中国工人在立陶宛西造船厂.

sentences.en: the strong lithe bodies of gymnasts
sentences.cn: 体操运动员强壮柔韧的身体

sentences.en: Where the rain Shou Shou Stroll, the mood changed from all lithe.
sentences.cn: 在那里雨中绶绶的慢步, 心情的脱变一切轻盈.

trans.tran_cn: 柔软的，易弯曲的，绵，轻盈
trans.tran_en: having a body that moves easily and gracefully
